summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4622 for the improvement of 22nd Avenue Northwest, from West 65th Street to West 75th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53740, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
